pages.text: The $(item)Passivity Manipulator$() will allow $(l:glory/entry_gods)Deity Symbols and Shrines$() apply their passive effect at all times. This doesn't directly come at any cost; however, it does mean that no other manipulators, like $(l:energy/entry_supplier)Supplying Manipulators$() can be placed.
